title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.248 - Payroll distribution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.248 - Payroll distribution

State Regulations
(a) An
analysis of the total amount of salaries and wages paid or accrued for a
period, showing the component amounts to be charged to the various cost
centers. (b) The entry by which the
amount of salaries and wages paid or accrued for a period is charged in the
required detail to the accounts or records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.248

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
